<h1 align="center" id="title">Waltz</h1>

<p align="center"><img src="https://socialify.git.ci/chirag38-unity/Waltz/image?description=1&amp;descriptionEditable=Discover%20Stunning%20Wallpapers&amp;font=Bitter&amp;language=1&amp;name=1&amp;owner=1&amp;theme=Light" alt="project-image"></p>

<p id="description">Waltz is an adaptive wallpaper app crafted with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose designed to personalize your device with expressive dynamic visuals. Waltz lets users discover download and set stunning wallpapers automatically adapting its UI to fit each wallpaper‚Äôs color palette providing a cohesive look and feel. With a seamless interface and efficient performance Waltz redefines how you express yourself through your device.</p>
